Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Horizon3.ai is a cybersecurity company specializing in autonomous penetration testing and vulnerability management. Its flagship platform, NodeZero™, enables organizations to continuously assess their attack surfaces by simulating real-world attack scenarios. NodeZero identifies exploitable vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and weak credentials across on-premises, cloud, and hybrid environments, providing actionable insights for remediation. The platform operates without the need for persistent or credentialed agents, allowing safe deployment in production environments. It offers features such as NodeZero Kubernetes Pentesting for containerized workloads, NodeZero Tripwires™ for early threat detection, and NodeZero Insights for comprehensive risk analysis. Horizon3.ai collaborates with partners like Tech Mahindra and FedHIVE to extend its services to global enterprises and government agencies, supporting compliance with standards like FedRAMP High.

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: The Iambic AI-driven platform was created to address the most challenging design problems in drug discovery, leveraging technology innovations such as Enchant, a multi-modal transformer model that predicts clinical outcomes from the earliest stages of discovery, and NeuralPLexer, the best-in-class predictor of protein and protein-ligand structures. The integration of physics principles into the platform’s AI architectures improves data efficiency and allows molecular models to venture widely across the space of possible chemical structures. The platform enables identification of novel chemical modalities for engaging difficult-to-address biological targets, discovery of defined product profiles that optimize therapeutic window, and multi-parameter optimization for highly differentiated development candidates. Through close integration of AI-generated molecular designs with automated experimental execution, Iambic completes design-make-test cycles on a weekly cadence.

Top 5 Investors: HarbourVest Partners, Motus Ventures, Arm Holdings, NEOM Investment Fund, M Ventures
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: MemryX is a fabless semiconductor company that designs edge AI processing solutions powered by a proprietary compute-at-memory technology and dataflow architecture. By combining high performance and accuracy with low system power and a high-performance architecture, MemryX solutions can power AI needs for several industries, including transportation, IoT, and a wide range of industrial and consumer applications.  The company's products, such as the MX3 Edge Accelerator and MX3 M.2 Accelerator, utilize a proprietary compute-at-memory architecture and dataflow design to deliver high-performance AI processing with low power consumption. These accelerators are compatible with various host processors, including x86, Arm, and RISC-V, and support popular AI frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and ONNX. MemryX's solutions are applicable in industries such as video management systems, industrial automation, education, and smart vision. The company's technology aims to simplify AI deployment by allowing users to compile and run AI models without extensive retraining or tuning. MemryX also provides a Developer Hub with resources for installing, deploying, and optimizing AI solutions.

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Companies spend $15bn annually on talent acquisition in the US. The most important metric in performance recruitment advertising is the conversion from the paid click on the job platform to the application the employer receives. Industry-wide, apply conversion is just 5% today.  This means that 95% of candidates are dropping off, and 95% of budgets are wasted! The biggest reason for abandonment is the redirection of the candidate from the job platform to the company site; this step has a 70% bounce rate.  SonicJobs have built proprietary AI Web Agents that enable candidates to apply seamlessly on any site without redirection to the career site. Instead of a 5% conversion, SonicJobs delivers a 26% conversion; 5X better.  The SonicJobs AI Agents create inherently scalable B2B connectivity where employers and their applicant tracking systems (ATS) don't need to do any API tech work and only pay per application.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology, Software
Description: Granica is the world's first AI Data Readiness Platform, creating cutting-edge and enterprise-ready AI infrastructure services.
Top 5 Investors: New Enterprise Associates, Bain Capital Ventures, Abstract, Kevin Hartz, Frederic Kerrest
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: The Granica AI Data Readiness Platform helps data engineers and data platform leaders build AI-ready data in support of their AI, ML and analytics consumers. Armed with AI-ready data, these teams can improve their models, control their costs, and preserve privacy. Granica makes AI safe, effective and efficient by optimizing the data sets used to train and fine-tune LLMs and other AI models, as well as optimizing data used during inference and RAG. Granica makes tabular and NLP training data more efficient by optimizing the compression of cloud data lakehouse files such as Apache Parquet to lower storage cost by up to 60% and improve query performance by up to 56%. Granica delivers privacy and safety for AI inputs and outputs, mitigating the risk of sensitive data leakage and harmful content while also improving AI accuracy, performance and fairness. Granica also makes AI more effective by curating and refining training data sets, selecting the most impactful samples for training in order to increase model performance. By making data AI-ready, model-powered applications deliver more accurate and more useful results, increasing the trust in AI. Granica is optimized for enterprises and technology companies in data and AI-intensive industries such as financial services, retail and ecommerce, geo-spatial intelligence, and autonomous vehicles.

Our customers range from individual creators and YouTubers to broadcasters, streamers, and edtech platforms. Description: We are expand navigable roadways for autonomous vehicles from 3% to 95%, today, by equipping each car with our onboard vision hardware.
Top 5 Investors: Techstars, Katalyst Ventures, StratMinds, Techstars Ventures, TBD Angels
Founders: Emily Leung, Raj Singh, Sravan Puttagunta
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation
Full Description: Only 3% of US roadways are covered by the high-definition master maps that today's self-driving cars require to navigate. Without a hard tether to these maps, or beyond their bounds, autonomous vehicles simply cannot operate. Worse, the coverage of these maps is expanding at a rate of only 2% every 5 years. At Hyperspec AI we are expanding navigable roadways for autonomous vehicles to 95%, today, by equipping each car with our onboard vision hardware that localizes and navigates with true autonomy. Our high-frequency periodic calibration corrects for drift using satellite imagery to achieve continuous precise real-time positioning at a fraction of the cost. Hyperspec AI is my third company and the second to focus on mapping and localization for autonomous vehicles. I am a serial entrepreneur with successful exits and the deep domain expertise required to lead this new generation of navigation technology. Today, my team includes top talent in computer vision, simulation, and high-performance edge computing. With $860K raised and $750K in revenue booked to date with a $1.2M backlog, we have traction and momentum. Our focus is on partnership opportunities that accelerate our time-to-market to meet the immediate industry demand.

Full Description: Heart attacks cause 12 million deaths annually, yet 50% are initially misdiagnosed, doubling mortality rates. Our AI outperforms the top 1% of cardiologists in heart attack detection, identifying critical cases earlier and more accurately. This has the potential to reduce heart attack deaths by 75% within five years while delivering significant financial benefits to hospitals - boosting revenue through accurate STEMI triage, reducing false positives, and freeing up critical beds faster. Beyond heart attacks, we’re already certified for 38 additional ECG-based diagnoses like arrhythmias and heart failure, positioning PMcardio as the AI-driven standard for cardiovascular care. As of October 2024, we’ve onboarded 60,000 healthcare professionals to PMcardio, screening 1.1 million patients. We’re working with leading health systems like Mount Sinai, Duke Health, Presbyterian, SSM Health & many others. We’re scaling fast to bring AI-driven decision-making to every step of the cardiovascular care pathway. To date, there are over 30 internal and external publications on PMcardio’s AIs, including 6,000 patients enrolled in a RCT, further validating our clinical impact. We’ve built a world-class team of entrepreneurs, physicians, software engineers and executives from healthcare unicorns, alongside senior advisors from leading providers and payers, as well as two former presidents of cardiology associations shaping clinical guidelines for heart attack care, and a former FDA director.

Full Description: The Alectio platform is the first full-stack, end-to-end, ML-driven self-serve DataPrepOps platform® enabling ML teams to prepare, curate, annotate, manage, version and visualize their training data in a few clicks, in near-real-time and quasi-automated manner. Alectio's proprietary technology is based on the fundamental belief that ML models can be trained with the same (sometimes better) performance with just a fraction of the data (which means lower labeling, storage and compute costs, and eventually the possibility of training on the edge). Data Scientists wrap their regular model and raw data with the Alectio's SDK and the Alectio curation engine guides the training process strategically so that the model gets trained on the most informative data; they'll never have to spend a minute on data preparation again! We're neither a labeling company nor an MLOps company: we're building a new category providing the entire workflow to prepare data during training which allows ML experts to build models and datasets simultaneously, reducing time to market, and a new training paradigm that will lead orgs to actual AI profitability. Alectio uncovers the smart data inside your big data, unlocking model performance and saving machine learning experts both time and money.

AccurKardia’s AK+ Guard™—an AI-driven hyperkalemia detection solution using Lead I ECG data to help patients with conditions like CKD and ESRD identify life-threatening high potassium levels earlier—received FDA Breakthrough Device Designation and was accepted into the FDA Total Product Life Cycle (TAP) Advisory Program in December 2024. The company’s aortic stenosis detection model, AK-AVS™, received FDA Breakthrough Device Designation in October 2024. AccurKardia completed the 2024 Cohort of MedTech Innovator (MTI) and was one of five companies selected for the inaugural American Heart Association’s Heart and Brain Health Accelerator track within MTI.

Full Description: Asylia Diagnostics is a diagnostics technology platform intended to provide safer immunotherapy for cancer patients. We then use our data platform and AI-powered technology to transform these highly heterogeneous patient populations into well-defined subgroups that share common molecular and immuno-pathophysiology profiles. We then use discovered endotypes, biomarkers, and drug targets to develop patient stratification, enrichment, and indication expansion strategies, early hits/leads for the therapeutic pipeline, and eventually complex theranostic products together with our biopharma and IVD partners.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Health Care, Information Technology, Machine Learning
Description: Syntegra applies state-of-the-art machine learning models to create synthetic healthcare datasets.
Top 5 Investors: Village Global, First Spark Ventures, Berkeley Catalyst Fund (BCF), GRIDS Capital, Impact Venture Capital
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Syntegra applies state-of-the-art machine learning models to create validated, synthetic data derivatives of health care data that match all of the statistical properties of the underlying data, but guaranteed to contain none of the original data, and cleared of privacy issues. Healthcare systems and data aggregators are forced to impose ever greater barriers to clinical data access. Syntegra is unique in developing a very large, open-access data platform of high quality, patient-level real-world data, trained using modern machine learning methods on health system information. Users can leverage our platform to conduct analytics, building predictive models, generating synthetic control groups for clinical trials and more. Since training is done on data at rest, and only deep learning model parameters are sent from the Syntegra API to the Syntegra servers, there is no risk of identifiable personal information leaving our secure platform. To satisfy health system security teams and end-users, numerous methods of validation, leak-testing and benchmarking are applied to the data derivatives before they pierce the health system’s firewall. Syntegra’s solution is scalable, and usable across many types of data, from images to financial information to sensor streams, will be securely added to our data lake over time. The company is led by a team of extraordinary serial entrepreneurs and university faculty with deep knowledge in medicine and data science.

Full Description: Squark® applies machine learning-based prediction automatically, with no-code, for any classification, regression, or time-series problem. Create highly -accurate predictions—in minutes—with no programming. Made for marketing analysts to connect their spreadsheets, martech systems and other data sources, Squark puts the brilliance of data science into the hands of non-technical business users via an easy-to-use, no-code online app. You don’t need to learn the complexities of AI and ML algorithms nor hire data scientists and programmers to implement predictive analytics and machine learning to find the insights and actions to power your business. You simply upload your data to Squark and click to get the results. Squark operates as simply as a spreadsheet. Using supervised machine learning, Squark builds and compares scores of models automatically from your training data and chooses the best one and then creates your predictions. Remarkably, the accuracy of Squark models is equal to or better than with custom development projects. This is the productivity breakthrough that puts AI power into daily use by marketing analysts at companies from the F100 to SMB. Squark's disruptive technology empowers the business user to go beyond traditional descriptive and diagnostic analytics and find the future-focused insights to action either manually or via marketing automation. Results are explainable and transparent and models can be exported for embedding into production systems, or use our API, or deploy Squark as a managed service or white label solution. Finally, you see timely answers to predictive questions—insights that were impossible using reports and traditional business intelligence tools can be delivered by your analytics team in minutes. With no code and no data scientists required. Try our Squark's Freemium version at https://squarkai.com/free-squark before your competitors do.

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Internet Services, Natural Resources, Science and Engineering, Software, Sustainability, Transportation
Full Description: Ports, rivers, beaches, and harbors are polluted. Over 50% are considered impaired (not safe for routine use) as a result of misplaced debris, oil spills, bacteria presence, and industrial runoff. Maritime stakeholders both monitor the condition and health of their waters by hand, and clean adverse pollutants by hand. We automate this process from start to finish. Our DataPod™ smart buoy unlocks scalable real time water quality data infrastructure. This provides stakeholders with risk reports and acts as a canary in a coal mine for pending pollution threats. Our Gilligan AI™ also helps users analyze their data, forecast future conditions, and take action. We don't just stop at telling you there's a problem, our Rover AVPro autonomously skims oil, algae, dead-fish, and marine debris from coastal waterways. This allows stakeholders to focus on the task at hand, automate their operation, and increase their efficiency and safety of remediation and cleanup efforts.  Clean Earth Rovers is deployed nationally in Florida, Ohio, and California.

Description: Fully automated physician documentation using Artificial Intelligence
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Vocalto, a fully automated healthcare documentation tool, is returning humanity to medicine through the use of Artificial Intelligence.  Vocalto uses Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning to parse a conversation between a patient and their physician and create a transcript.  From this transcript, Vocalto creates a recognizable SOAP note based on the conversation.  Finally, Vocalto parses the information in the transcript and sends Medications, Allergies, Diagnoses and other data directly into the physicians Electronic Medical Record for storage.  Automating physician documentation is posed to remove dozens of documentation hours from physicians each week and bring back back the face-to-face interaction that both physicians and patients crave.

Ajivar provides a means to engage the whole student body in a granular way from the students’ first to the last day at the university. Being able to track student progress, improve resiliency, and overall mental wellbeing will not only change the institutional culture but also increase retention and student success. Increased resiliency and EI also improves staff satisfaction, cohesion, and retention.

Description: At MaiVERIC, we enhance the capabilities of public safety agencies to further protect the communities they serve.
Founders: Jeffrey Krause, Manuel Monroy, Thomas Avery
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Government and Military, Privacy and Security, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: At MaiVERIC, we enhance the capabilities of public safety agencies to further protect the communities they serve. We do so responsibly, under the law, respecting people’s privacy rights. Our mission is to contribute to the spread of safety and peace in our communities by deploying AI-based systems capable of rapidly analyzing data sets at scale. Our Eye Witness application allows investigators to compare data received from crime scenes with millions of lawfully compiled known offender records. When likely matches are found, agents can use the available profiles to expedite their investigations. When no matches are found, agents have the ability to add the unknown faces to person-of-interest databases, which in turn can be used to track suspects linked to multiple investigations.   The deployment of Eye Witness across several agencies allows for the secure sharing of known offenders and persons of interest, significantly increasing the effectiveness of the system to solve cases.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Developer APIs, Health Care, Information Technology, Machine Learning, Medical, Natural Language Processing, Software, Speech Recognition
Description: Simbo AI, is providing Enterprise LLM AI platform for businesses for automation without human intervention using Symbolic RAG architecture.
Top 5 Investors: IIT Mandi Catalyst
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Simbo AI, is a groundbreaking technology company providing Enterprise LLM AI platform for businesses for automations without human intervention. Simbo does not train its own LLMs but enriches existing LLMs of the choice with its proprietary Symbolic RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) architecture.  Symbolic RAG is a perfect combination of LLM and symbolic knowledge bases for hallucination-free Gen AI platform for enterprise applications. As a specialized use case, Simbo is using its Gen AI platform for medical practice automation. It helps healthcare providers reduce burnout and costs, by automating mundane tasks using proprietary Lossless clinical NLU. Simbo AI is currently automating following use cases: - AI Medical Scribe as an API: Simbo sends patient conversation transcript to all well known LLMs from AWS, Azure, and open-source LLMs and uses proprietary clinical note ranking algorithm to identify the best clinical note. Our algorithm optimizes the cost as well to ensure it fits the budget. - Autonomous AI Phone triage bot: Triages the patients on inbound and outbound calls to autonomously resolve tasks. It helps reduce burden on healthcare staff and reduce cost for medical practice. Simbo has invented a groundbreaking concept known as 'Lossless NLU,' powered by our proprietary BISLU platform. Lossless NLU takes text or voice input and transforms it into a structured meaning representation called Thought Representations, without losing any part of the meaning. In contrast to prevailing NLU methods that primarily predict intent and entities, Lossless NLU retains the full context. We integrate Lossless NLU with Generative AI to eliminate hallucinations and perform fact checking. In the healthcare sector, where patient well-being is of utmost importance, the presence of hallucinations is unacceptable.

Alirtify uses news data as well as social media, blogs, and other publicly available data to reduce the noise and only share what is important to the user. The key is geo-tagging contacts in the user’s connections from various platforms to news and social media within 60 miles radius of those contacts. We utilize artificial intelligence (AI) technologies like machine learning and natural language processing to provide rapid insights by cutting through the noise of daily alerts, drastically reducing response times to curate real-time intelligence from millions of research papers, blogs and news stories.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Transportation
Description: Go360 provides state of the art Synthetic AI Camera systems using GANs and Edge Computing
Top 5 Investors: Berkeley SkyDeck Fund
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation
Full Description: Go360 has developed Synthetic AI cameras that leverage GANs to boost frame rate, resolution and provide image inpainting capabilities to remove artifacts from weather conditions. Additionally, GANs that remove privately identifiable information from the camera input stream can be deployed alongside the CMOS sensor in an ASIC or FPGA chip. The hardware accelerators enable cameras to boost frame rate and upscale images or adversely downsample images and reduce framerate to operate in bandwidth constrained environments. Synthetic augmentation of the camera capabilities can be beneficial to time synchronize cameras where the shutters are also misaligned by synthetically generating frames between real frame captures from the CMOS sensor. We are further pushing the boundaries of what is possible.
